channel.title: Naturescape Source and Client SO AWESOMEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!
channel.description:
Hi guys, I thought today I would post this. Naturescape's source was edited from Pkjad. Please don't flame about anything. So yea enjoy. The ip on the client is 127.0.0.1 just to tell you know. :P
Credits: (Requested many times) Pk Jad 25% Delta 50% Me (Naturescape) 25% "Tell me if I forgot anyone."
Client : http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?tt2t2ytgzlm Source : http://www.mediafire.com/?gmzdtkumzzz
Pictures: [IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo178/Jneey520/Ddsspeced39.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo178/Jneey520/Darkbow.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo178/Jneey520/Barrowspic.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i373.photobucket.com/albums/oo178/Jneey520/Vengother.jpg[/img]
Have fun, and rep if you want. xD

item.title: Naturescape Source and Client SO AWESOMEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:46, topic:314498”][quote author=ytpingas link=topic=410974.msg3037505#msg3037505 date=1258864709]
I swear to god…

IF THESE FUCKING IDIOTS DONT stop posting their problems here like: i got compiling problems im gonna report all of them to a mod/admin!!!

ANY NOOB WOULD HAVE THE SENCE to “search” for the problem. even a noob who doesnt know what coding is can do that.

PRETTY SIMPLE GUYS…
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 21, 2009, 10:39:46 pm[/size][hr]RE[post]

Anti syi code help:

Make a new file and save it as :

SYIBlocker.java

now put this inside it:

CODE
Code:

[code]import java.util.ArrayList;

public class SYIBlocker
{

public final static void start()
{
    addCrasher("SYIpkpker");
}

public final static void addCrasher(String Name)
{
    Names.add(Name.toLowerCase());
}

public final static boolean bannedSYI(String _Name)
{
    _Name = _Name.toLowerCase();
    for(String Name : Names)
    if(_Name.contains(Name))
    return true;
    for(Character c : _Name.toCharArray())
    if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit(c))
    if(Character.isSpaceChar(c))
    if(!Character.isSpaceChar(c))
    return true;
    return false;
}

public final static void banIP(String Address)
{
    Addresses.add(Address.toLowerCase());
}

public final static boolean bannedIP(String _Address)
{
    _Address = _Address.toLowerCase();
    for(String Address : Addresses)
    if(Address.equals(_Address))
    return true;
    return false;
}
public static ArrayList<String> Names = new ArrayList<String>();
public static ArrayList<String> Addresses = new ArrayList<String>();

}
[/code]
Save it and close it.

Now go to server.java

and search for

CODE
Code:

long lastTicks = System.currentTimeMillis();

You will see:

CODE
Code:

    int waitFails = 0;
    long lastTicks = System.currentTimeMillis();
    long totalTimeSpentProcessing = 0;
    int cycle = 0;

and add this code

CODE
Code:

SYIBlocker.start();

under

CODE
Code:

int cycle = 0;

next go into

CODE
Code:

void run

and in there find:

CODE
Code:

(Found < 3

under that add:

CODE
Code:

if(!SYIBlocker.bannedIP(connectingHost)) {

Also you might have to add a

CODE
Code:

}
in void run.

(Not gonna explain that statement any further… if you dont know where to add the } dont bother to try this tutorial.)

Last step:

go to client.java

search for

CODE
Code:

if(playerName == null || playerName.length() == 0)

ull see

CODE
Code:

if(playerName == null || playerName.length() == 0)
disconnected = true

;

under

Code:

disconnected = true;

add this code below me:

Code:

if(SYIBlocker.bannedSYI(playerName)){
SYIBlocker.banIP(connectedFrom);
disconnected = true;
this.destruct();
return;
}

save close compile.

credits to anti-syi starter
[/quote]

You honestly are the biggest idiot on these forums. Anti-SYIs do not work.[/quote]True, what about one connection per Ip…

Read full topic
